FILE
  HareDeclarationsImpl(DECLARATIONS)
    HareGeneralDeclarationImpl(GENERAL_DECLARATION)
      HareFunctionDeclarationImpl(FUNCTION_DECLARATION)
        PsiElement(FN_KW)('fn')
        HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
          PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('foo')
        HarePrototypeImpl(PROTOTYPE)
          PsiElement(LP)('(')
          HareParameterListImpl(PARAMETER_LIST)
            HareParametersImpl(PARAMETERS)
              HareParameterImpl(PARAMETER)
                PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
                PsiElement(COLON)(':')
                HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
                  HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                    HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                      HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                        PsiElement(INT_TYPE)('int')
          PsiElement(RP)(')')
          HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
            HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
              HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                PsiElement(VOID_TYPE)('void')
        PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
        HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
          HareCompoundExpressionImpl(COMPOUND_EXPRESSION)
            PsiElement(LBR)('{')
            HareExpressionListImpl(EXPRESSION_LIST)
              HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                HareBindingListImpl(BINDING_LIST)
                  PsiElement(LET_KW)('let')
                  HareBindingsImpl(BINDINGS)
                    HareBindingImpl(BINDING)
                      PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
                      PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
                      HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                        HareAllocExpressionImpl(ALLOC_EXPRESSION)
                          PsiElement(ALLOC_KW)('alloc')
                          PsiElement(LP)('(')
                          HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                            HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                              HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                                HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                                  PsiElement(DECIMAL_DIGITS)('1')
                          PsiElement(RP)(')')
                    PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
                    HareBindingImpl(BINDING)
                      PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('b')
                      PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
                      HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                        HareAllocExpressionImpl(ALLOC_EXPRESSION)
                          PsiElement(ALLOC_KW)('alloc')
                          PsiElement(LP)('(')
                          HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                            HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                              HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                                HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                                  PsiElement(DECIMAL_DIGITS)('1')
                          PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
                          HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                            HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                              HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                                HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                                  PsiElement(DECIMAL_DIGITS)('2')
                          PsiElement(RP)(')')
                    PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
                    HareBindingImpl(BINDING)
                      PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('c')
                      PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
                      HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                        HareAllocExpressionImpl(ALLOC_EXPRESSION)
                          PsiElement(ALLOC_KW)('alloc')
                          PsiElement(LP)('(')
                          HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                            HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                              HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                                HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                                  PsiElement(DECIMAL_DIGITS)('1')
                          PsiElement(DOTDOTDOT)('...')
                          PsiElement(RP)(')')
              PsiElement(EOS)(';')
              HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                HareAllocExpressionImpl(ALLOC_EXPRESSION)
                  PsiElement(FREE_KW)('free')
                  PsiElement(LP)('(')
                  HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
                    HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                      HareSymbolImpl(SYMBOL)
                        PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
                  PsiElement(RP)(')')
              PsiElement(EOS)(';')
            PsiElement(RBR)('}')
      PsiElement(EOS)(';')
